Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder and neck section of a brown pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with self-slip and bears traces of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink, now very smudged.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393312) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393312)
